brand_name.rationale: Combines 'focus' (primary benefit) with 'flow' (ADHD hyperfocus state) and AI (adaptive technology)
brand_name.trademark_considerations: Clear for mobile app registration, distinctive in productivity space

brand_positioning.value_proposition: The only AI that understands your ADHD brain and works with your natural patterns
brand_positioning.differentiation_strategy: ADHD-positive technology that celebrates neurodivergence rather than trying to 'fix' it
brand_positioning.target_audience_alignment: Adults with ADHD who are tired of productivity tools that don't understand their brains
brand_positioning.competitive_distinction: First productivity app explicitly designed for ADHD brain patterns with positive representation

brand_personality.tone_of_voice: Encouraging friend who 'gets it' - supportive without being condescending
brand_personality.communication_style: Direct, clear language with warmth and humor about ADHD experiences
brand_personality.emotional_appeal: Validation and empowerment for ADHD individuals who've struggled with traditional tools

logo_concept.design_direction: Flowing geometric shapes that represent adaptive patterns and brain connectivity
logo_concept.symbol_meaning: Interconnected nodes that reorganize themselves, symbolizing adaptive ADHD thinking
logo_concept.scalability_considerations: Clean lines that work at 16px app icon size and large marketing displays
logo_concept.platform_adaptations: iOS rounded corners, Android adaptive icons, with consistent core symbol

primary_colors.usage: Primary brand color, focus states, call-to-action buttons
Positive feedback, completion states, energy indicators

secondary_colors.usage: High energy states, energy management alerts

color_palette.color_strategy: ADHD-informed color psychology avoiding overstimulation while providing clear state communication

primary_typeface.rationale: Platform-native fonts optimized for readability with ADHD considerations

secondary_typeface.usage: Alternative font for users with dyslexia or reading difficulties

typography.hierarchy_system: Clear size distinctions with generous line spacing for ADHD visual processing

iconography_style.icon_approach: Outlined style with optional filled states for active elements
iconography_style.consistency_guidelines: All icons follow 24dp grid with 2dp stroke weight for optimal ADHD recognition

app_icon.concept: Flowing interconnected shapes suggesting adaptive AI and brain connectivity
app_icon.platform_variations: iOS: Rounded corners, drop shadow; Android: Adaptive icon with solid background
app_icon.size_adaptations: Recognizable from 16px to 1024px with detail scaling appropriately

in_app_branding.header_treatment: Clean typography with energy state color accents
in_app_branding.button_styling: Rounded corners, generous padding, clear state changes
in_app_branding.card_design: Soft shadows, ample whitespace, color-coded categories
in_app_branding.illustration_style: Gentle, abstract representations of focus states and energy patterns

store_presence.app_store_presentation: ADHD-positive imagery showing diverse users in successful focus states
store_presence.screenshot_branding: Consistent visual hierarchy emphasizing calm, organized interfaces
store_presence.promotional_graphics: Warm, inclusive imagery celebrating neurodivergent productivity styles

core_messages.primary_tagline: AI that gets your ADHD brain
value_statements: Work with your brain, not against it
Productivity for the beautifully ADHD mind
feature_descriptions: Energy-aware AI that matches tasks to your mental state
Visual workflows that make sense to ADHD thinking
Gentle focus sessions that prevent burnout

content_voice.writing_style: Conversational, validating, and empowering with subtle humor about ADHD experiences
content_voice.vocabulary_guidelines: Avoid clinical/medical language; use person-first and strength-based terminology
content_voice.accessibility_language: Plain language principles with clear structure and scannable content

marketing_messages.app_store_description: Finally, a productivity app that understands how your ADHD brain actually works. FocusFlow AI adapts to your energy patterns, suggests the right tasks at the right time, and helps you achieve focus without fighting your natural rhythms.
marketing_messages.social_media_voice: Your ADHD-positive tech friend sharing wins, tips, and solidarity
marketing_messages.user_communication: Celebrating small wins, normalizing ADHD experiences, providing practical support

logo_usage_rules: Minimum clear space equal to logo height on all sides
Never distort proportions or change colors
color_usage_guidelines: Always test color combinations for ADHD accessibility
Use color plus additional indicators (shape, position, text)
Provide alternative visual cues for colorblind users
typography_standards: Maintain generous line spacing for ADHD readability
Never use all caps for body text
Provide OpenDyslexic option where technically feasible

accessibility_compliance.color_contrast_standards: WCAG AAA preferred (7:1), minimum AA (4.5:1) with ADHD testing
accessibility_compliance.text_readability: Support up to 200% text scaling with layout preservation
accessibility_compliance.inclusive_language: Person-first language, strength-based framing, avoid stigmatizing terms

consistency_maintenance.update_procedures: Quarterly review with ADHD community feedback integration
consistency_maintenance.quality_control: All brand applications tested with neurodivergent focus groups
